titre: Happy Warm Feet - How to Keep Your Feet Warm
intro: Hello and welcome to my new Instructable. This time I will show you a classic trick told me and used by a German market women who stood at the weekly market and sold her goods in all weather conditions. This trick will keep your feet warm.
intro_items: Hello and welcome to my new Instructable.
This time I will show you a classic trick told me and used by a German market women who stood at the weekly market and sold her goods in all weather conditions.
This trick will keep your feet warm.
materiaux:
Supplies
  • 1. Two pair of socks
  • 2. Two small, thin plastic bags
  • 3. A pair of shoes or boots

etapes.html:
1. Step 1:

Étapes :

  1. For demonstration purposes, I decided on
  2. 1. A pair of thin socks
  3. 2. Two small, thin plastic bags
  4. 3. A pair of thick socks and
  5. 4. Boots
  6. in this order.

2. Step 2:

Étapes :

  1. Put on the thin socks.

3. Step 3:

Étapes :

  1. Put on the thin bags.

4. Step 4:

Étapes :

  1. Put on the thick socks.
  2. If you don't want to or can't wear two pairs of socks, you can also pull the bag over the sock and put the shoe or boot on straight away. However, this can be a slippery feeling as the bag moves on the sock and in the shoe.

5. Step 5:

Étapes :

  1. Put on the boots.
  2. Use a shoe or boot that has enough space for the sock-bag combination. It should not be too tight. The bag prevents the warmth of the foot from being lost. The foot will stay warm, but may sweat a little.

6. Step 6:

Étapes :

  1. Tada. Nobody sees the bags!
  2. I use this trick every winter at outdoor events in general.
  3. !!! Please note that you are creating a moist environment for your feet, so only do this for a long period of time if your feet are healthy and can tolerate it. I also recommend taking a foot bath afterwards. !!!
  4. Thank you for reading, watching and paying attention - and happy warm feet.
